Cedant: The New India Assurance Co. Ltd.
Perils_Covered: Flood, cloud burst, Fire, explosion, Earthquake, Landslides, Terrorists threats, attacks, Sabotage, Bomb threat, bomb explosion, Disruption in power supply, Cyber Attack, Machinery Breakdown, Allied Perils
Main_Activities: Modification of Diversion Tunnel into Tunnel Spillway Arrangement - Civil & HM Works (Tunnel Spillway, Adit to GOC, GOC Gate Shaft, Inlet Bellmouth, Outlet Concrete Dyke and Energy Dissipation Arrangement)
Proposed_Terms_Conditions: Letter of Acceptance to be returned duly signed and stamped on each page by authorized signatory; Contact Head of Project, Teesta-V Power Station, NHPC Limited for taking over work site and commencing works immediately; BOQ template must not be modified/replaced by bidder; Abnormally High Quoted Items (AHR) identified for specific schedules.
